extension.name: Content - PopFeed
extension.author: Christopher Mavros
extension.copyright: Copyright (C) 2011 Christopher Mavros. All rights reserved.
extension.description: The simplest Plugin that popups a form to submit feedback.

field.name: auto_all
field.label: Auto PopFeed
field.description: This is an option to automatically include PopFeed in every article. If this is No, to include PopFeed in an article you write {popfeed}Leave your Feedback (or whatever else text in here){/popfeed}

field.name: auto_all_text
field.label: Auto Text
field.description: If Auto PopFeed is on, this is the text that appears in the end of each article.

field.name: show_in_frontpage
field.label: Show in Frontpage
field.description: This is an option to show in the front-page articles, or not.

field.name: show_in_blog
field.label: Show in Blog Layout
field.description: This is an option to show in blog layout articles, or not.

field.name: secids
field.label: Auto Sections
field.description: This is an option to include PopFeed, only in articles of the specified sections. Auto PopFeed must be Yes. IDs Example: 1,2,3

field.name: catids
field.label: Auto Categories
field.description: This is an option to include PopFeed, only in articles of the specified categories. Auto PopFeed must be Yes. IDs Example: 1,2,3

field.name: email_recipient
field.label: Email Recipient
field.description: The recipient of the feedback message.

field.name: from_name
field.label: Mail From Name
field.description: The name of the feedback message's sender

field.name: from_email
field.label: Mail From Email
field.description: The email of the feedback message's sender

field.name: name_label
field.label: Name Label
field.description: The label next to the name input.

field.name: email_label
field.label: Email Label
field.description: The label next to the email input.

field.name: subject_label
field.label: Subject Label
field.description: The label next to the subject input.

field.name: message_label
field.label: Message Label
field.description: The label next to the message textarea.

field.name: pre_text
field.label: Form Into Text
field.description: The text displayed before the feedback form.

field.name: button_text
field.label: Button Text
field.description: The text displayed on the feedback form's button

field.name: auto_subject
field.label: Auto Subject
field.description: This is an option to automatically retrieve the subject from the article's title

field.name: auto_recipient
field.label: Auto Recipient
field.description: This is an option to automatically retrieve the email recipient from the article's author

field.name: after_text
field.label: Thank you Text
field.description: The text displayed after submitting feedback

field.name: error_text
field.default: Your feedback could not be submitted. Please try again.
field.label: Error Text
field.description: The text displayed to the user when his feedback fails to be mailed

field.name: invalid_email
field.default: Submitted email is invalid. Please try again.
field.label: Invalid Email Error Message
field.description: The error message when the user submits an invalid email

field.name: exact_url
field.label: Exact URL
field.description: This is an advanced option about the url retrieval way. If your site is http and your server/host supports https this should be No.

field.name: disable_https
field.label: Disable HTTPS
field.description: This is an advanced option about the url retrieval way. Please enable it if PopFeed posts in https and your site is http.

field.name: fixed_url
field.label: Fixed URL
field.description: A simple solution for people that want to use PopFeed in an exact page. Change this to Yes and write the URL of PopFeed in the Fixed URL Address parameter

field.name: fixed_url_address
field.label: Fixed URL Address
field.description: If fixed url is true, this address is used for PopFeed to post the form.
